item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, May 17, 2025 at 3:05 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Getting AI to write good SQL (184 points | 100 comments)
2. Thoughts on thinking (296 points | 206 comments)
3. Show HN: Kokoro TTS – Free Text to Speech Converter with Multilingual AI Voices (15 points | 1 comment)

6. XTool – Cross-platform Xcode replacement (8 points | 3 comments)

23. The first year of free-threaded Python (247 points | 237 comments)

25. Foundry (YC F24) Is Hiring – Founding Engineer (ML × SWE) ( | hide)

29. Returning to My Roots in Hardware (60 points | 8 comments)
